title: Lesson 02 - One Minute French
description: In lesson 2 of One Minute French you will learn a few more useful words in French which you'll use every day. Remember - even a few phrases of a language can help you make friends and enjoy travel more. Find out more about One Minute French at our website - http://www.oneminutelanguages.com. One Minute French is brought to you by the Radio Lingua Network and is ©Copyright 2008.
